content: this versatile shirt/pants combo for sylvanian and calico critter adults offers both short and long-sleeved versions it could also be made as a jumpsuit or shirt/shorts it is perfect for the father critters but the moms might like it too the outfit has raglan shaping and is crocheted in one piece with no seams it is crocheted from the top down provision is made for the critters tails the outfits are made with #10 crochet cotton the 2 25mm hook used in this pattern is called a b hook in aluminum hooks and a 2 hook in steel hooks this pattern is free but if you want to say thank you please create a project page here on ravelry i love seeing what everyone makes
